post.title: Local Designers in Vietnam
post.content:
## Custom-made jewelry made by Saigon Army

After trading English lessons with the daughter of a local blacksmith, special education teacher turned entrepreneurial blacksmith Greg Hitz picked up the skills to create minimalistic, unisex jewellery, some using old Indochinese currency and Vietnamese silver, hand-hammered up to 300 times. Greg says Saigon Armoryâ€™s simple designs 'encourage honesty and self-reflection, complementing the individual rather than the jewellery itself'. Saigon Armory can size customers at their hotel and deliver custom orders in two days.
